title: Courtyard, Dishwasher, Cable Ready, Instant Hot Water
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 669 - 1061 Sq.

In a neighborhood historically called Little Scandinavia, Ballard on the Park embodies the Danish concept of deep contentment and cozy well-being—known as hygge—by blending an inviting, convivial atmosphere with the warm wood tones and clean lines of contemporary Scandinavian design.
Come home to a comfortable studio, one or two bedroom home that pairs an intuitive layout and modern features with access to resident amenities that enhance your relaxation and satisfaction.

Linen Closet, Tile Floors, Island Kitchen, Views, Stainless Steel Appliances, Den, Ice Maker, Instant Hot Water, Range, Refrigerator, Vaulted Ceiling, Freezer, Granite Countertops, Walk-In Closets, Carpet, Eat-in Kitchen, Dining Room, Microwave, Dishwasher, Disposal, Pantry, Window Coverings, Kitchen, Oven

Conference/Meeting room, BBQ/Picnic Area, Bike Repair Station - Fully Equipped, Cable Ready, Security System, Wired for high-speed internetPackage Service, Covered parking for some cars, Controlled Access, Walk to bus line, Community web site, Pet Washing Station, Outdoor hot tub, Professional Demonstration Kitchen, Courtyard, Green and flowered areas, High-speed internet access, Intercom entry system, On-call Courtesy Patrol, Controlled building access, 24hr.
Business center, Property Manager on Site, Short-term lease, Well maintained grounds, 24hr.
Emergency maintenance, Package Lockers, Media room/theater
We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.
There is a $300 pet deposit per pet, and a $50 monthly pet rent.
Other animals must remain in a cage.
Please call for complete pet policy information.
Other animals must remain in a cage.
